text: Ha hotle tlhokomelong ea hao ka sehlopha sa bana ba Israele kamorao ho Moshe. Bana ba Israle ba re ho Moporofeta: “Re hlomamisetse morena, re tle re tsebe ho loanela tsela ea Allah.” Eaba o re: “ha se moo e tla re ha le laeloa ho loana e be ha le loane na?” ba araba ka hore: “re ke keng ra loanela tsela ea Allah joang haele moo re phalalisitsoe malapeng a rona le bana ba rona?” Joale e itse hoba ba laeloe ho loana, eaba ba ea koeneha kaofela haese ba’maloa feela har’a bona. Ruri Allah U hlokolosi ka baetsa-libe
